data.name: Liam's Journey
data.detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Find young Liam's way home while exploring a mysterious cave full of danger in this pixel art action platformer. Pull your way out using your grappling hook, meet unique characters and overcome hundreds of hand crafted challenges to decide Liam's fate

Swing Through Obstacles


Use your grappling hook to grab and swing through the level
This helps Liam traverse and reach difficult places

Dodge Danger


There are all kind of dangers in this mysterious cave
Run and doge as you explore your way out

Strike Back


You are not limited to just run away from danger
Aim and shoot your grappling hook into various enemies and obstacles

Try Again Immediately


Reloads are instant. Try again right away without having to start over
No long and boring respawn cycles to wait for

data.short_description: Find young Liam's way home while exploring a mysterious cave full of danger in this pixel art action platformer. Pull your way out using your grappling hook, meet unique characters and overcome hundreds of hand crafted challenges to decide Liam's fate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Officially supported hardware vendor drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Officially supported hardware vendor drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system; Other configuration and user environment as provided by default with the supported distribution (Kernel, Compositor, etc.); Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system; Other configuration and user environment as provided by default with the supported distribution (Kernel, Compositor, etc.); Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver
